attributes.action: NOT include diagnosed MS patients in the ESA medical system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are people with chronic conditions which are not going to go away, such as Multiple sclerosis included in the fiasco that is the ESA medical!
This process in itself is stressful & stress can trigger relapses in MS suffers.
Please show us your metal Mr Brown & end this cruelty.
